data.question: What is the empirical formula of the compound Cu(1,3-bdc)?
At what temperature was the crystal structure of Cu(1,3-bdc) determined?
What is the space group of Cu(1,3-bdc)?
What type of magnetism does Cu(1,3-bdc) exhibit at low temperatures?
What is the significance of the frustration parameter (f) value of 16.5 for Cu(1,3-bdc)?
data.answer: It signifies a strong effect of spin frustration.

data.question: Is the crystal structure of Cu(1,3-bdc)·0.11 H2O identical to Cu(1,3-bdc)?
Does the compound C32H24Cu6O26 contain a 16-membered ring?
Is the Cu(1)-Cu(2) distance within bonding distance for two Cu(II) ions in C32H24Cu6O26?
What method was used for magnetic measurements of Cu(1,3-bdc)?
What is the role of imidazole in the synthesis of Cu(1,3-bdc)?
data.answer: To increase the solubility of 1,3-bdcH2 and to buffer the reaction solution.

data.question: Does heating Cu(1,3-bdc) at 240 °C for 2 hours lead to significant decomposition?
What is the crystal system of Cu(1,3-bdc)?
What is the shortest known metal-metal distance in any metal-organic hybrid kagomé reported to date?
data.answer: The in-plane Cu-Cu distance in Cu(1,3-bdc).

data.question: Is the 16-membered ring in C32H24Cu6O26 planar?
What is the significance of the solvent-accessible void of 45 Å3 in Cu(1,3-bdc)?
data.answer: It can be occupied by an incidental solvent molecule.

data.question: What is the crystal system of C32H24Cu6O26?
Does the compound Cu(1,3-bdc) exhibit spin frustration?
What is the role of Cu(OH)F in the synthesis of Cu(1,3-bdc)?
data.answer: It acts as a mineralizing agent to promote crystal formation.

data.question: Is the compound Cu(1,3-bdc)·0.11 H2O isostructural with Cu(1,3-bdc)?
What is the function of thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) in the study of Cu(1,3-bdc)?
data.answer: To determine the loss of mass due to solvent removal and to assess decomposition.
